title: Szechuan (Sichuan) stir spicy chicken salad
ingredients: ['1 whole chicken', '2 teaspoons chilli powder', '1 tablespoon oil', '2 spring onions, chopped', '1/2 bulb garlic, finely chopped', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '2 tablespoons light soy sauce', '2 teaspoons caster sugar', 'a few coriander leaves (optional)']
